languages.text: {n}Покорно откланявшись, музыкант закидывает сумку с крысой на плечо, а флейту прячет в скромный футляр.{/n} "Не смею испытывать ваше терпение. До встречи, Лорд-капитан".
languages.translation_comment:
После диалога убрать флейтиста и его вещи с локации
Выход

traits.locale_text: {n}Покорно откланявшись, музыкант закидывает сумку с крысой на плечо, а флейту прячет в скромный футляр.{/n} "Не смею испытывать ваше терпение. До встречи, Лорд-капитан".

languages.translation_comment:
После диалога убрать флейтиста и его вещи с локации
Выход

languages.text: {n}With an obedient bow, he slings the bag with the rat inside over his shoulder, then puts the flute into a simple case.{/n} "I wouldn't dare try your patience further. May we meet again, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Покорно откланявшись, музыкант закидывает сумку с крысой на плечо, а флейту прячет в скромный футляр.{/n} "Не смею испытывать ваше терпение. До встречи, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}With an obedient bow, he slings the bag with his rat over his shoulder and puts the flute into a simple case.{/n} "I wouldn't dare try your patience further. I will see you around, Lord Captain."
{n}With an obedient bow, he slings the bag with his rat over his shoulder and puts the flute into a simple case.{/n} "I wouldn't dare try your patience further. I will see you around, Lord Captain."

{n}With an obedient bow, he slings the bag with the rat inside over his shoulder, then puts the flute into a simple case.{/n} "I wouldn't dare try your patience further. May we meet again, Lord Captain."

{n}With an obedient bow, he slings the bag with the rat inside over his shoulder, then puts the flute into a simple case.{/n} "I wouldn't dare try your patience further. May we meet again, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Avec une révérence servile, il jette le sac contenant le rat par-dessus son épaule et range sa flûte dans un simple étui.{/n} « Loin de moi l'idée de mettre votre patience à l'épreuve. J'espère que nos chemins se croiseront de nouveau, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}With an obedient bow, he slings the bag with the rat inside over his shoulder, then puts the flute into a simple case.{/n} "I wouldn't dare try your patience further. May we meet again, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec une révérence servile, il jette le sac contenant le rat par-dessus son épaule et range sa flûte dans un simple étui.{/n} « Loin de moi l'idée de mettre votre patience à l'épreuve. J'espère que nos chemins se croiseront de nouveau, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: {n}Con una reverencia sumisa, el flautista se echa al hombro la saca donde lleva la rata, y luego guarda la flauta en un rudimentario estuche.{/n} «No osaré poner a prueba su paciencia. Hasta la próxima, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}With an obedient bow, he slings the bag with the rat inside over his shoulder, then puts the flute into a simple case.{/n} "I wouldn't dare try your patience further. May we meet again, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una reverencia sumisa, el flautista se echa al hombro la saca donde lleva la rata, y luego guarda la flauta en un rudimentario estuche.{/n} «No osaré poner a prueba su paciencia. Hasta la próxima, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: {n}男は素直に頭を下げると、ネズミの入ったバッグを肩にかけてフルートを簡素なケースに入れた。{/n}「あなた様の忍耐をこれ以上試す勇気はありません。またお会いできますように、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: {n}With an obedient bow, he slings the bag with the rat inside over his shoulder, then puts the flute into a simple case.{/n} "I wouldn't dare try your patience further. May we meet again, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は素直に頭を下げると、ネズミの入ったバッグを肩にかけてフルートを簡素なケースに入れた。{/n}「あなた様の忍耐をこれ以上試す勇気はありません。またお会いできますように、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: {n}他恭顺地鞠了一躬，将装着老鼠的袋子挎在肩上，之后把笛子装进了一个简简单单的盒子里。{/n}“我不敢继续考验您的耐心了。希望我们以后还有机会见面，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}With an obedient bow, he slings the bag with the rat inside over his shoulder, then puts the flute into a simple case.{/n} "I wouldn't dare try your patience further. May we meet again, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}他恭顺地鞠了一躬，将装着老鼠的袋子挎在肩上，之后把笛子装进了一个简简单单的盒子里。{/n}“我不敢继续考验您的耐心了。希望我们以后还有机会见面，舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}Mit einer gehorsamen Verbeugung legt er sich die Tasche mit der Ratte über die Schulter und verstraut seine Flöte in einem einfachen Kasten.{/n} "Ich würde es nicht wagen, Eure Geduld weiter zu beanspruchen. Vielleicht sehen wir uns wieder, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}With an obedient bow, he slings the bag with the rat inside over his shoulder, then puts the flute into a simple case.{/n} "I wouldn't dare try your patience further. May we meet again, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einer gehorsamen Verbeugung legt er sich die Tasche mit der Ratte über die Schulter und verstraut seine Flöte in einem einfachen Kasten.{/n} "Ich würde es nicht wagen, Eure Geduld weiter zu beanspruchen. Vielleicht sehen wir uns wieder, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}İtaatkâr bir şekilde eğilerek içinde sıçanın bulunduğu keseyi omzuna atıyor. Ardından flütünü alelade bir kılıfa yerleştiriyor.{/n} "Sabrınızı daha fazla sınamaya asla cüret etmem. Yeniden görüşmek üzere Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}With an obedient bow, he slings the bag with the rat inside over his shoulder, then puts the flute into a simple case.{/n} "I wouldn't dare try your patience further. May we meet again, Lord Captain."
